Research

         

Research

My research interests encompass large-scale search and recommendation in various domains, including the Web, social media, and enterprises. As a result of my work, I have contributed to the open-source Terrier Information Retrieval platform, and published research papers in several major academic venues. In particular, I am a regular speaker and program commitee member of several premiere conferences in IR, including SIGIR, CIKM, WWW, WSDM, RecSys, ECIR, ICTIR, AIRS, and SPIRE. I received the best paper award at RecSys 2015 and best paper runner-up award at RecSys 2020. In addition, I have served in the organization committee of WSDM 2016, RecSys 2020, SIGIR 2021, CIKM 2023, and UMAP 2024, and currently serve as steering committee member for RecSys, and as a member of the editorial board of ACM Transactions on Social Computing and Foundations and Trends in Information Retrieval.
